p: To investigate on how these genes interact, protein–protein interaction analyses based on the STRING database was performed. It showed that a total of 17 genes ( FEN1, POLE, RFC4, MCM2, MCM3, MCM4, MCM5, MAD2L1, CDK1, BUB1B, CCNB2, CDC20, WEE2, PLK1, CCNA1, E2F1 and CDC25A) integrated the network involving DNA synthesis and replication, while 5 genes ( CYP51A1, LSS, DHCR7, DHCR24 and SQLE) integrated into the steroid synthesis network (Fig. 2D).
